Title: Prohibits transcripts being made from video conference meetings by artificial intelligence without conspicuous disclosure during such meeting
Summary: Prohibits transcripts being made from video conference meetings by artificial intelligence without conspicuous disclosure during such meeting that such meeting may be transcribed by artificial intelligence.
LawCode: Add ยง50-h, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to prohibiting transcripts being made from video conference meetings by artificial intelligence without conspicuous disclosure during such meeting
